item.title: Intern Experience at Lyft
item.description: ðâ¨ Discover the journey of two data scientists, Morteza Taiebat and Han Gong, who started as interns at Lyft and now contribute to impactful projects. They share insights on their experiences, focusing on sustainability and driver loyalty. Their work includes evaluating electric vehicle (EV) adoption and designing incentive strategies for drivers. If you’re considering an internship at Lyft, their stories highlight the growth opportunities and collaborative culture that await you! ð±ð…
